body_html: I get an error if I click on the confirmation link while logged out. I could solve this by redirecting to the root path, instead of the sign in path. The difference is that now the user is not automatically signed in. I don't think this might be a problem, as this is the default behavior of devise and is the recommended procedure in terms of security https://stackoverflow.com/questions/18655334/avoid-sign-in-after-confirmation-link-click-using-devise-gem
